title: How to show runes and stats when pressing C
body:
Pretty much title


I swear I used to be able to see both when pressing C, control C to scroll pass them is extra finger waste.

replies.body:
Hotkeys > Menus > Show Advanced Player Stats.

The defaults is still C so far as I can tell, so not sure why it isn't working for you, but that's the bind to check.
even if I reset to default it dosen't work. :(

How strange, perhaps try running a client repair through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

Failing that, submitting a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is probably your best bet.
